item.name: [0204ALL00ALL]PRO_CAL_04_ALL_ALL_ALL_NSTOUEN_SGPCETVPEC_SGAPIL2_PRC16_GDCORC016
item.description:
Aim : Check the payload and response of dmd_calcul (Oracle/WM exchanges)
o  0 - Check of PCE, APIL and GDC
o  1 - Check of FGA(no paylod created for FGA) and ZQG


PCE : SGPCETVPEC
APIL : SGAPIL2
GDC : GDCORC16
FGA : NSTOUEN
ZQG : PRC16

item.name: [020201600PCE]PRO_CAL_02_PCE_SGPCETVPEC_SGPCEEVPEC_SGPCECPEC_VAPIL_MEVPCET
item.description:
0 - one son calculated from 6AM to 9AM (SGPCETVPEC) only
    Expected result : no father triggered
1 - other son calculated from 6AM to 10 AM (SGPCEEVPEC)
    Expected result : father is triggered from 6 to 9 AM
2 - change on list of hours (first son SGPCETVPEC calculated from 10AM to 11AM )
    Expected result : father is calculated on 6AM to 10AM
3 - both children calculated triggered :
SGPCETVPEC calculated from 12AM to 5AM
SGPCEEVPEC calculated from 11AM to 5AM
    Expected result : father is calculated from 11AM to 5AM and dmd_calcul on 10 to 11 AM and dmd_calcul on 12AM to 5AM
4 - Test on APIL on first day of link (ETRSP2-1752)
5 - Delete acq and point of data of test case 3 and then drop file again
    Expected result : father is calculated from 11AM to 5AM and dmd_calcul on 10 to 11 AM and dmd_calcul on 12AM to 5AM


Data set (case 0,1,2,3) :
Sons : SGPCETVPEC and SGPCEEVPEC
Father : SGPCECPEC
Data set (case 4) :
Son : MEVPCET
Father : VAPIL
